SELECT ApprovalStep AS "ApprovalStep" FROM jwf_processdescription PD INNER JOIN jwf_process P ON P.ProcessDescriptionID = PD.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE P.ProcessID = #{ProcessID}
mapper.update:

mapper.select: SELECT UR.UserCode AS "UR_Code", UR.DisplayName AS "UR_Name", BG.DeptCode AS "DEPT_Code", BG.DeptName AS "DEPT_Name", BG.JobPositionCode AS "JobPositionCode", BG.JobPositionName AS "JobPositionName", BG.JobTitleCode AS "JobTitleCode", BG.JobTitleName AS "JobTitleName", BG.JobLevelCode AS "JobLevelCode", BG.JobLevelName AS "JobLevelName" FROM sys_object_user UR INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup BG ON UR.UserCode = BG.UserCode WHERE UR.UserCode = #{userID}

SELECT WorkItemID AS "WorkItemID" , TaskID AS "TaskID" , ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , PerformerID AS "PerformerID" , WorkItemDescriptionID AS "WorkItemDescriptionID" , Name AS "Name" , DSCR AS "DSCR" , Priority AS "Priority" , ActualKind AS "ActualKind" , UserCode AS "UserCode" , UserName AS "UserName" , DeputyID AS "DeputyID" , DeputyName AS "DeputyName" , State AS "State" , TO_CHAR(Created,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "Created" , TO_CHAR(FinishRequested,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "FinishRequested" , Finished AS "Finished" , Limit AS "Limit" , LastRepeated AS "LastRepeated" , TO_CHAR(Finalized,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "Finalized" , TO_CHAR(Deleted,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "Deleted" , InlineSubProcess AS "InlineSubProcess" , Charge AS "Charge" , BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData1" , BusinessData2 AS "BusinessData2" , BusinessData3 AS "BusinessData3" , BusinessData4 AS "BusinessData4" , BusinessData5 AS "BusinessData5" , BusinessData6 AS "BusinessData6" , BusinessData7 AS "BusinessData7" , BusinessData8 AS "BusinessData8" , BusinessData9 AS "BusinessData9" , BusinessData10 AS "BusinessData10" FROM JWF_WORKITEM WHERE ProcessID = #{processID} and state != '512' ORDER by Created, WorkItemID

SELECT NVL(S.SchemaContext, '') AS "SchemaContext" FROM jwf_forminstance FI INNER JOIN jwf_forms F ON FI.FormID = F.FormID INNER JOIN jwf_formsschema S ON F.SchemaID = S.SchemaID WHERE FI.FormInstID = #{formInstID}
